text: Marlon Rodrigues Xavier (born 20 May 1997), is a Brazilian professional footballer who plays as a leftback for the Süper Lig club Trabzonspor on loan from Fluminense.https://twitter.com/Trabzonspor/status/1293480224722690048 ==Professional career== Marlon made his professional debut for Criciúma in a 1-0 Campeonato Brasileiro Série B win over Botafogo on 7 November 2015. After spending his early career in Brazil with Criciúma and Fluminense, Marlon joined Boavista F.C. on loan on 5 August 2019. ==References== ==External links== * * Ogol Profile Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:People from Cascavel Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:Trabzonspor footballers Category:Boavista F.C. players Category:Fluminense FC players Category:Criciúma Esporte Clube players Category:Süper Lig players Category:Primeira Liga players Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série A players Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série B players Category:Association football fullbacks Category:Brazilian expatriates in Turkey Category:Brazilian expatriates in Portugal Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in Turkey Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in Portugal Category:Expatriate footballers in Turkey Category:Expatriate footballers in Portugal
